articles.content:
A potential coronavirus vaccine being developed at the University of Oxford will be trialled on people from Thursday, Matt Hancock revealed at Tuesday's Government briefing.

articles.title: Coronavirus Scotland: Tributes for ‘much loved’ Borders nurse and great-granny who died from Covid-19 - The Scottish Sun
articles.content:
A 'MUCH LOVED' Borders nurse and great-granny has tragically died from coronavirus. 
Tributes have now flooded in for Angie Cunningham who passed away yesterday in the ICU at the Borders General Hospital from the virus.

articles.title: Three key signs to distinguish coronavirus from your allergy symptoms - Mirror Online
articles.description: Amid the coronavirus pandemic, many people are concerned that their allergy symptoms are actually a sign of COVID-19. However, there are three key signs to distinguish allergies from coronavirus
articles.content:

articles.description: With the vast majority of people in the UK likely still vulnerable to Covid-19 and thoughts turning to easing the lockdown, the threat of a second wave is looming

articles.title: Hay fever symptoms: Is a persistent cough a sign? Expert reveals what to look out for - Express
